metadata.title: CVE-2021-46313 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The binary MP4Box in GPAC v1.0.1 was discovered to contain a segmentationfault via the function __memmove_avx_unaligned_erms (). This vulnerabilitycan lead to a Denial of Service (DoS).

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
